text: brrda phu periybtheiyb phrrya khxng phwk khea nı hmu phwk cea wa semuxn mæ khxng phwk khea nan phwk nang midi pen mæ khxng phwk khea brrda mæ khxng phwk khea midi pen xun dı nxkcak pen phu hı kaneid phwk khea theanan læa thæcring phwk khea nan klaw kha phud thi na keliyd læa klaw thec læa thæ cring xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ thrng yk thosʹ hı semx
